metadata.title: App Store Connect API 3.7 release notes

inlineContent.text: App Store Connect API version 3.7 provides resources that enable you to automate actions you take in App Store Connect.
Developers now need to provide a description for all beta localizations before submitting to beta app review for external testing with TestFlight. You can update
Name is now a required field when using
. To see other attributes you can create or modify, see
Developers can now look up in-app purchase price point equalization using
You can now read age ratings for France by using
endpoint now shows multiple distribution keys when you have multiple configured.
There is a new required attribute
, which gives all your localizations the same formatter. To learn more, see
resources are removed and replaced with

abstract.text: Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website and in App Store Connect.
Attributes that describe an App Infos resource.
Attributes that you set that describe the new resource.
The properties that describe the state of an app preview or app event video.
Attributes that describe an App Previews resource.
Attributes that describe an App Store Versions resource.
String that represents the state of an app version.
Strings that represent the operating system intended for the bundle.
Literal values that represent types of signing certificates.
Read App Store information including your App Store state, age ratings, Brazil age rating, and kids’ age band.
Get the alternative distribution keys for a specific app.

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: Read an app’s alternative distribution key

abstract.text: Get a list of in-app purchase price points and their equivalent in a specified currency.

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: List all in-app purchase price point equalizations

abstract.text: Download sales and trends reports filtered by your specified criteria.
Get information about the territory availability for a subscription.

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: Read the availability of a subscription

abstract.text: Update the localized information for a specific beta app and locale.
Add app-level localized information for a new locale.
Add a new leaderboard to your app.
The properties that describe a preview frame image for an app preview or app event video.
String that represents the display type of an app preview.
Manage territory and date settings that make your app available for pre-order.
